text: Has anyone had issues with foreign keys not being enforced with sqlite before?
Not that I can remember. I was doing some fk work last night, so I'll let ya know what I figure out if it works
How were you establishing the FK rule?
I tried the 'references' attribute when setting up the model with FKs, when I look at the schema it has the rules,  but I can still insert records with FKs that don't exist
It's on my branch that I pushed, not quite done yet though
Hmm, yeah I didn't check to see if the rule is enforced
Seemed to just be an issue with `upsert()`, I used `findOneOrCreate()` instead and it works fine now
